trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event of a <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipula o evento **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** de um <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventHandler> delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventHandler> delegado é definido para o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> evento o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> classe.

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: Você pode acessar o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> evento o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> classe especificando uma sub-rotina chamada **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** no arquivo global. asax para seu aplicativo ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event is raised during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> é gerado durante o <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> constructs a <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> object using the Windows identity supplied by IIS and the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> constrói um <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> usando a identidade do Windows fornecida pelo IIS e o atual do objeto <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> e o transmite para o **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** eventos.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> object supplied to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> objeto fornecido para o **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento para definir o <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> propriedade <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> para um personalizado <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> objeto.

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property during the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the Windows identity supplied by IIS is used as the identity for the current request.
trans-unit.target: Se você não especificar um valor para o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> propriedade durante o **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento, o Windows a identidade fornecida pelo IIS é usada como a identidade da solicitação atual.

trans-unit.source: If IIS uses anonymous authentication, then the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> object is set to the identity returned by the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se a autenticação anônima, o IIS usa o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> objeto é definido como a identidade retornada pelo <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is only raised when the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode.Windows> and the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> is an active HTTP module for the application.
trans-unit.target: O **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento só é gerado quando a autenticação <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> é definido como <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode.Windows> e o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> é um módulo HTTP ativado para o aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento para definir o <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> propriedade <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> para um personalizado <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> objeto.
